DOC.brief_summary: There controversy regard use preparation LH activity patient polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) high endogenous LH activity . In research aim compare urinary menotrophin versus recombinant FSH ( rFSH ) respect prevention OHSS
DOC.brief_title: hMG Recombinant FSH OHSS Prevention PCOS Patients Undergoing IVF
DOC.detailed_description: Polycystic ovary syndrome diagnose accord Rotterdam criterion . Patients older 38 year serum FSH level ≥12mIU/ml history ovarian surgery exclude study . All patient give combined oral contraceptive ( Yasmin ) prior ovulation induction cycle . Leuprolide Acetate ( Lucrin daily ; Abbott , Istanbul ) therapy start mid-luteal phase induce pituitary regulation , initiate dose 1.0 mg SC daily pituitary down-regulation establish . The leuprolide acetate dose reduce 0.5 mg daily day human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) administration . After GnRH analogue suppression achieve , patient randomize use block randomization ( block two ) stimulation hMG ( Menogon ; Ferring Pharmaceuticals . Istanbul ) rFSH ( Gonal-F ; Serono Istanbul ) . Starting dose 150IU first 3 day stimulation , daily dosing determine individually . Serial Estrodiol ( E2 ) level two-dimensional follicle measurement transvaginal ultrasonography ( LOGIC 200 PRO , General Electric , Korea ) perform least two dominant follicle reach dimension 18 mm great diameter . Human chorionic gonadotropin ( Pregnyl , Organon , 10,000 IU- IM ) administer , follow transvaginal oocyte retrieval 36 hour later . The criterion coast institute serum E2 > 3600 pg/ml multiple intermediate follicle . During coast period , gonadotropin withheld , leuprolide acetate continue 0.5mg/d . ICSI perform patient . Fertilization assess 20h ( ±1h ) , embryo quality assess 28 , 44 , 68h ( ±1h ) oocyte retrieval . A top- quality embryo define four five cell day 2 , seven cell day 3 , multinucleation . Vaginal progesterone gel 90 mg/day 8 % ( Crinone ; Serono ) luteal support give oocyte retrieval clinical pregnancy ( 9-10 week gestation ) negative serum βhCG test ( 13-15 day embryo transfer ) .
DOC.criteria: Women PCOS Patients old 38 year serum FSH level ≥12mIU/ml history ovarian surgery exclude study
